import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import routesName from '../../routes' import './cart.css' const Cart = ()=>{ const allCarts = useSelector((state)=>state.cartSlice) return (

Shoping Cart

{ allCarts.cartItems.length === 0 ? (
Your cart is empty
Start Shopping
):(

Product

Price

Quantity

Total

{ allCarts.cartItems?.map((item)=>(

{item.name}

{item.description}

$ {item.price}
{item.cartQuantity}
$ {item.price * item.cartQuantity}
)) }
Sub Total ${allCarts.totalQuantity}

Taxs and Shipping calculate at checkout

Continue Shopping
) }
) } export default Cart
